All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BonusCategory
This is a special category calculating the bonus.
DefaultScoringFunctions
This is a helper class for the DefaultScoringTable.
DefaultScoringTable
This is the implementation of the classic scoring table of the game of yahtzee!
Dice
This is the dice interface.
FairDice
This is an implementation of a fair dice.
GameApp
This class is the orchestrator of the program.
GameInput
This is the interface for input.
GameStatus
This is the status of the game and keeps track of the current situation.
GameView
This is the interface for the game output.
GeneralCategory
This is a general implementation of a ScoreCategory.
PartialCategory
This class is a Partial implementation of the ScoreCategory.
Player
Basic player class.
ScoreCategory
This interface is the base for any scoring category.
ScoringTable
General interface for a scoring table.
StandardGameInput
This implementation of GameInput uses the terminal for gathering the input.
StandardGameStatus
This class implement a standard game of Yahtzee! The game will be played using 5 dices with 6 faces each.
StandardGameView
This is the standard implementation of GameView.
SumOfUpperCategory
This is a special category for calculating the score of the upper part of the table.
Yahtzee
Yahtzee! This program aim to implement the game of yahtzee! The aim of the game is to get the highest score.
